fields.label: Down arrow
fields.name: avb_down_arrow
fields.instructions: Enable to show an arrow pointing down to indicate that scrolling is possible.

fields.label: Height
fields.name: avb_height
fields.instructions:
• Select the height of the banners. The unit is vh, which stands for viewport height.
• The viewport is the area of the browser where webpages reside the scrollable area.
• If you select 50vw, that means the banners will be 50% the height of the view port, which means you'll be able to see another 50% of the website below.
• If you select 100vw, the height of the banners will fill the whole viewport height.

choices.default: Wavelength
